name: TheDailyDosefromCountable
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Countable, America’s premier civic-tech app, now brings you The Daily Dose -- a quick-study podcast that tells you daily what your government is doing, and what you can do about it. 
The Daily Dose is essential for bright, engaged people -- who are also busy. It aims to break down the barrier of entry to citizen participation in government. Whether you’re on the subway, in the car, out jogging, or in the shower, The Daily Dose provides the information and tools you need to take action and make your voice heard.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
